summary: "Buffy the Vampire Slayer," created by Joss Whedon, is an American TV show about a young woman, Buffy Summers, who is destined to fight vampires and demons. Though she wants a normal life, Buffy learns to accept her role as the Vampire Slayer. She's helped by a group of friends called the "Scoobies" and a mentor called a Watcher. The show, which aired from 1997 to 2003, is set in the fictional town of Sunnydale, built on a portal to hell. It received critical acclaim and has influenced many other TV shows with strong female leads.
title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
